content: > you are very welcome to join our > growing facebook community share > project photos and connect with other > crocheters in a positive and > encouraging environment click > here 1 > an ad-free printer friendly pdf > version of this pattern is available > in my etsy shop click here to find > sweet bee crochet on etsy 2 these little crochet flowers are absolutely adorable and super easy to make they can be easily personalized by adding a fun button in the centre and you can get creative by making them in different yarn weights **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - clear photos - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - approximately 1 yard of worsted weight yarn in any colour for the flower - approximately 1 yard of green worsted weight yarn for the leaf - 4 mm hook - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet 2 https //www etsy com/ca/shop/sweetbeecrochetshop
